name: BLT Bites Appetizer
author: BRENDA BELLAMY
summary: These are delightful, refreshing, little appetizers for a picnic that are hard to stop eating after the first one.
ingredients: 16  cherry tomatoes, or more to taste
directions: Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes
Drain bacon slices on paper towels
Let cool for 5 minutes; crumble into a bowl
Cut a thin slice off the top of each tomato
Invert tomatoes on a paper towel-lined plate to drain
Combine bacon, mayonnaise, green onions, Parmesan cheese, and parsley in a small bowl
Spoon bacon mixture evenly into tomatoes
Refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving
